existing_features.title: Add a new “Machinery” content block to the existing Process section to showcase the key machines used for varagu/kodo millet husk processing (e.g., husk/dehusking machine, separator/cleaner, packaging/packing machine) with clear English titles and short descriptions.

Apply a “good color” treatment to the new Machinery block by using the existing design tokens (primary/accent/card/border) to create clear visual hierarchy (icon/image area, title, body text) while preserving the site’s pure white page background requirement.

Generate and add static machinery illustrations/photos (as simple, clean visuals) and render them in the Machinery block from the frontend public assets directory (do not serve images from the backend).
